mapper.select: select g.id ,g.userid, p.title, g.su, g.pay, g.cprice, substring(b.juso, 1, instr(b.juso,' ')-1 ) as juso ,state from gumae as g inner join product as p on g.pcode=p.pcode inner join baesong as b on b.id=g.bae_id order by g.id desc
mapper.update: update gumae set state=#{param1} where id=#{param2}
